issue.title: random_shuffle and shuffle should have consistent signatures

discussion.p: The functions random_shuffle and shuffle both take arguments providing a source of randomness, but one take its argument by rvalue reference, and the other requires an lvalue reference. The technical merits of which form of argument passing should be settled for this specific case, and a single preferred form used consistently.

resolution.p: [DEPENDS ON WHETHER RVALUE OR LVALUE REFERENCE IS THE PREFERRED FORM]
